Reviews.Title: i got RIPPED OFF!!
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves to take pictures so got for her to take pictures of her summer with me.in order to download pic.package tells you to install the disc.IT DIDNT COME WITH ONE!!! tryed to find on internet cant find!!?? I have a new compt.but package says you will loose pic.if battery goes dead so still have it pluged in!!!!Pissed!!! Realy nice to do to a seven year old.

Reviews.Title: I loved them, the service was quick.
Reviews.Author: Theresa Brown
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my young adult girls. They loved it. I feel a peace of mind because they have a flashlight and camera always at hand.  Thanks!

ProductInfo.Features:
1.3 Mega Pixel
Built in Bright white LED light
8MB internal memory
1.1" color screen
Video record mode
ProductInfo.Name: DC1130 Purple digital clip camera with built in LED flash light
